sentences: Jeff Clayton (February 16, 1954 â€“ December 16, 2020) was an American jazz alto saxophonist and flautist.
With his brother John Clayton he founded The Clayton Brothers in 1977, and later formed the Clayton-Hamilton Jazz Orchestra with Jeff Hamilton.
From 1989 to 1991 he was a member of the Philip Morris Superband.
Clayton died on December 16, 2020, after suffering from kidney cancer.
Boogie-Down, Ernestine Anderson and the Clayton-Hamilton Jazz Orchestra, 1989
Explosive!, Milt Jackson and the Clayton-Hamilton Jazz Orchestra, 1999
Back in the Swing of Things, The Clayton Brothers, 2005
Christmas Songs, Diana Krall and the Clayton-Hamilton Jazz Orchestra, 2005
